item.title: Factors
item.description: Introduction This is the eleventh post in the series Introduction to R. In the previous post, we learnt about dataframes. In this post, we will learn about factors. create factors order levels specify labels check levels number of levels Categorical or qualitative data in R is treated as data type factor. Create Factors args(factor) ## function (x = character(), levels, labels = levels, exclude = NA, ## ordered = is.
